Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Kolmar
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner, and  Division due to, street blockage near Division/Kolmar.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner, and  Division due to, street blockage near Division/Kolmar.

Allow extra travel time.
